W11_SCAN_COMM_AREAIN_110_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_SCAN_COMM_AREAIN_110_DETAIL.text: Fate's guidance is leading you to the maiden.

W11_LDMK_COMM_MAJIN_1_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_MAJIN_1_000_DETAIL.text: A race called the Kikir live here.

W11_LDMK_COMM_MAJIN_2_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_MAJIN_2_000_DETAIL.text: A race called the Kikir live here.

W11_LDMK_COMM_MAJIN_3_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_MAJIN_3_000_DETAIL.text: A race called the Kikir live here.

W11_LDMK_COMM_SATO_1_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_SATO_1_000_DETAIL.text: A race called the Imeru live here.

W11_LDMK_COMM_SATO_2_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_SATO_2_000_DETAIL.text: A race called the Imeru live here.

W11_LDMK_COMM_SATO_3_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_SATO_3_000_DETAIL.text: A race called the Imeru live here.

W11_LDMK_COMM_MIYAKO_1_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_MIYAKO_1_000_DETAIL.text: The capital city of the Imeru. It sometimes connects to other worlds.

W11_LDMK_COMM_ISEKI_1_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_ISEKI_1_000_DETAIL.text: Someone lived here once, but now all that remains is the sound of the wind.

W11_LDMK_COMM_ISEKI_2_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_ISEKI_2_000_DETAIL.text: Someone lived here once, but now all that remains is the sound of the wind.

W11_LDMK_COMM_ISEKI_3_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_ISEKI_3_000_DETAIL.text: Someone lived here once, but now all that remains is the sound of the wind.

W11_LDMK_COMM_HANA_A_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_HANA_A_DETAIL.text: The Epuyke has begun to bud. You can make it grow further by defeating Ancikar's fiends.

W11_LDMK_COMM_HANA_B_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_HANA_B_DETAIL.text: The Epuyke has become a seedling. You'll need to defeat more of Ancikar's fiends if you want it to bloom.

W11_LDMK_COMM_HANA_C_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_HANA_C_DETAIL.text: The Epuyke is blooming with beautiful flowers.

W11_LDMK_COMM_HANA_D_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_HANA_D_DETAIL.text: The Epuyke has wilted. It's almost time for the next maiden to take up the mantle.

W11_LDMK_COMM_HANA_E_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_HANA_E_DETAIL.text: The Epuyke has become a wicked blossom tainted with evil.

W11_LDMK_COMM_HANA_END_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_HANA_END_DETAIL.text: The Epuyke once stood here, but now it has wilted and vanished. Only a hole remains.

W11_LDMK_COMM_KOUDOU_100_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_KOUDOU_100_000_DETAIL.text: This cave will take you to the land above. A small amount of time will pass as you go through.

W11_LDMK_COMM_KOUDOU_110_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_KOUDOU_110_000_DETAIL.text: This cave will take you to the land below. A small amount of time will pass as you go through.

W11_LDMK_COMM_KOUDOU_200_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_KOUDOU_200_000_DETAIL.text: This cave will take you to the land above. A small amount of time will pass as you go through.

W11_LDMK_COMM_KOUDOU_210_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_KOUDOU_210_000_DETAIL.text: This cave will take you to the land below. A small amount of time will pass as you go through.

W11_LDMK_COMM_KOUDOU_300_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_KOUDOU_300_000_DETAIL.text: This cave will take you to the land above. A small amount of time will pass as you go through.

W11_LDMK_COMM_KOUDOU_310_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_KOUDOU_310_000_DETAIL.text: This cave will take you to the land below. A small amount of time will pass as you go through.

W11_LDMK_COMM_KOUDOU_400_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_KOUDOU_400_000_DETAIL.text: This cave will take you back to the other side. A small amount of time will pass as you go through.

W11_GIMK_COMM_TSUTA_00A_1_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_GIMK_COMM_TSUTA_00A_1_000_DETAIL.text: This will let you move to distant plateaus without encountering fiends. A small amount of time will pass if you choose to ride it.

W11_GIMK_COMM_TSUTA_00B_1_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_GIMK_COMM_TSUTA_00B_1_000_DETAIL.text: This will let you move to distant plateaus without encountering fiends. A small amount of time will pass if you choose to ride it.

W11_GIMK_COMM_TSUTA_02A_1_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_GIMK_COMM_TSUTA_02A_1_000_DETAIL.text: This will let you move to distant plateaus without encountering fiends. A small amount of time will pass if you choose to ride it.

W11_GIMK_COMM_TSUTA_02B_1_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_GIMK_COMM_TSUTA_02B_1_000_DETAIL.text: This will let you move to distant plateaus without encountering fiends. A small amount of time will pass if you choose to ride it.

W11_GIMK_COMM_TSUTA_04A_1_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_GIMK_COMM_TSUTA_04A_1_000_DETAIL.text: This will let you move to distant plateaus without encountering fiends. A small amount of time will pass if you choose to ride it.

W11_GIMK_COMM_TSUTA_04B_1_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_GIMK_COMM_TSUTA_04B_1_000_DETAIL.text: This will let you move to distant plateaus without encountering fiends. A small amount of time will pass if you choose to ride it.

W11_GIMK_COMM_TSUTA_05A_1_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_GIMK_COMM_TSUTA_05A_1_000_DETAIL.text: This will let you move to distant plateaus without encountering fiends. A small amount of time will pass if you choose to ride it.

W11_GIMK_COMM_TSUTA_05B_1_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_GIMK_COMM_TSUTA_05B_1_000_DETAIL.text: This will let you move to distant plateaus without encountering fiends. A small amount of time will pass if you choose to ride it.

W11_LDMK_COMM_ANA_00A_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_ANA_00A_000_TITLE.text: Trial of Love: Seed Planting Point

W11_LDMK_COMM_ANA_00A_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_ANA_00A_000_DETAIL.text: This hole is ideal for planting a nepenthes. Will doing so allow you to overcome the Trial of Love?

W11_LDMK_COMM_ANA_02A_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_ANA_02A_000_TITLE.text: Trial of Love: Seed Planting Point

W11_LDMK_COMM_ANA_02A_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_ANA_02A_000_DETAIL.text: This hole is ideal for planting a nepenthes. Will doing so allow you to overcome the Trial of Love?

W11_LDMK_COMM_ANA_04A_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_ANA_04A_000_TITLE.text: Trial of Love: Seed Planting Point

W11_LDMK_COMM_ANA_04A_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_ANA_04A_000_DETAIL.text: This hole is ideal for planting a nepenthes. Will doing so allow you to overcome the Trial of Love?

W11_LDMK_COMM_ANA_05A_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_ANA_05A_000_TITLE.text: Trial of Love: Seed Planting Point

W11_LDMK_COMM_ANA_05A_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_ANA_05A_000_DETAIL.text: This hole is ideal for planting a nepenthes. Will doing so allow you to overcome the Trial of Love?

W11_POP_COMM_EGG_00_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_POP_COMM_EGG_00_DETAIL.text: You sense a fiend inside this egg. It should be easy to smash.

W11_POP_COMM_MON_A00_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_POP_COMM_MON_A00_DETAIL.text: A fiend oozing with Ancikar's power.

W11_COMM_EV_DORA_01_001_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_COMM_EV_DORA_01_001_DETAIL.text: Will you meet a maiden and potential future Epuyke here?

W11_COMM_EV_DORA_01_002_TITLE.speaker: UI
W11_COMM_EV_DORA_01_002_TITLE.text: Potential Epuyke and a Journey's Beginning

W11_COMM_EV_DORA_01_002_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_COMM_EV_DORA_01_002_DETAIL.text: Your journey with the maiden has begun. You should talk to her before setting out.

W11_COMM_EV_DOROSO_01_001_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_COMM_EV_DOROSO_01_001_DETAIL.text: Will you meet a maiden and potential future Epuyke here?

W11_COMM_EV_BERUTA_01_001_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_COMM_EV_BERUTA_01_001_DETAIL.text: Will you meet a maiden and potential future Epuyke here?

W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_1_001_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_1_001_DETAIL.text: Accept the Trial of Wisdom from the witness in the dead-end cave.

W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_1_002_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_1_002_DETAIL.text: Accept the Trial of Strength from the witness in Kutsuwa Village.

W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_1_003_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_1_003_DETAIL.text: Accept the Trial of Love from the witness in Suzumu Village.

W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_1_004_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_1_004_DETAIL.text: The previous maiden has bloomed, and the Epuyke Festival has begun. You should go take it in.

W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_1_005_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_1_005_DETAIL.text: Once all the pollen has been collected, the festival will come to an end.

W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_1_006_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_1_006_DETAIL.text: The time has come for the next maiden to become the Epuyke.

W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_1_007_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_1_007_DETAIL.text: The previous maiden's Epuyke has wilted and vanished, leaving only a hole behind. You should plant the seed here.

W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_1_0065_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_1_0065_DETAIL.text: The time has come for the next maiden to become the Epuyke. Are you sure you're ready to begin the ritual?

W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_2_001_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_2_001_DETAIL.text: Accept the Trial of Wisdom from the witness.

W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_2_002_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_2_002_DETAIL.text: Accept the Trial of Strength from the witness.

W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_3_001_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_3_001_DETAIL.text: Accept the Trial of Wisdom from the witness.

W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_3_002_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_3_002_DETAIL.text: Accept the Trial of Power from the witness.

W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_3_003_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_LDMK_COMM_EPUIKE_3_003_DETAIL.text: Accept the Trial of Love from the witness.

W11_GIMK_COMM_KIRARI_01_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_GIMK_COMM_KIRARI_01_DETAIL.text: Pollen from the Epuyke has rained down to the ground. It somehow makes you think of falling tears.

W11_GIMK_COMM_KIRARI_02_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_GIMK_COMM_KIRARI_02_DETAIL.text: Pollen from the Epuyke has rained down to the ground. It somehow makes you think of falling tears.

W11_GIMK_COMM_KIRARI_03_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_GIMK_COMM_KIRARI_03_DETAIL.text: Pollen from the Epuyke has rained down to the ground. It somehow makes you think of falling tears.

W11_GIMK_COMM_KIRARI_04_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_GIMK_COMM_KIRARI_04_DETAIL.text: Pollen from the Epuyke has rained down to the ground. It somehow makes you think of falling tears.

W11_GIMK_COMM_KIRARI_05_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_GIMK_COMM_KIRARI_05_DETAIL.text: Pollen from the Epuyke has rained down to the ground. It somehow makes you think of falling tears.

W11_GIMK_COMM_KIRARI_06_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_GIMK_COMM_KIRARI_06_DETAIL.text: Pollen from the Epuyke has rained down to the ground. It somehow makes you think of falling tears.

W11_COMM_EV_DOROSO_01_002_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_COMM_EV_DOROSO_01_002_DETAIL.text: Could Chup have returned to the village?

W11_COMM_EV_DOROSO_01_003_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_COMM_EV_DOROSO_01_003_DETAIL.text: You should let the clerics and the worried Kup know that Chup is back.

W11_COMM_EV_EPUIKE_02_920_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_COMM_EV_EPUIKE_02_920_DETAIL.text: You can see the Epuyke from this place. Perhaps you can find the maiden here.

W11_COMM_EV_EPUIKE_02_930_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_COMM_EV_EPUIKE_02_930_DETAIL.text: Pretty stones litter the ground in this place. Perhaps you can find the maiden here.

W11_EVAR_COMM_RUN_231_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_EVAR_COMM_RUN_231_DETAIL.text: Chup wants to find a pretty stone for her little sister.

W11_COMM_EV_BERUTA_01_002_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_COMM_EV_BERUTA_01_002_DETAIL.text: Nana should ask her mother about the contents of the diary you found in the ruins. But will Yuk be willing to talk?

W11_COMM_EV_BATLLE_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_COMM_EV_BATLLE_DETAIL.text: The Kikir are beckoning to you. You can test your strength here.

W11_EVAR_COMM_TABLET_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_EVAR_COMM_TABLET_000_DETAIL.text: This is one of several fragments of a tablet prepared for the Trial of Wisdom. You wonder what will happen when you collect them all.

W11_EVAR_COMM_WISDOM_110_TITLE.speaker: UI
W11_EVAR_COMM_WISDOM_110_TITLE.text: Trial of Wisdom: Deciphering the Tablet

W11_EVAR_COMM_WISDOM_110_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_EVAR_COMM_WISDOM_110_DETAIL.text: You've collected all of the tablet fragments. Now you're ready to take on the final part of the Trial of Wisdom.

W11_EVAR_COMM_TIPS_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_EVAR_COMM_TIPS_000_DETAIL.text: The clerics are beckoning to you. They appear to have advice for Soyay the Pollinator.

W11_EVAR_COMM_STRENGTH_110_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_EVAR_COMM_STRENGTH_110_DETAIL.text: The fiend you need to defeat for the Trial of Strength should be somewhere in this area.

W11_EVAR_COMM_KIERU_300_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_EVAR_COMM_KIERU_300_DETAIL.text: You must pass through this cave in order to advance, but does it even connect to the other side?

W11_EVAR_COMM_KIERU_310_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_EVAR_COMM_KIERU_310_DETAIL.text: You have arrived at the ruins in accordance with Nana's destiny. What will you find here?
